New Records: Quinton de Kock scored 65 runs in 38 balls, a significant achievement in the match.
Key Match Events: South Africa won the match by seven runs after England failed to score off the last ball.
A crucial dismissal of Brook by Markram was a turning point in the game.
South Africa's bowlers performed well in the powerplay, particularly with Brook and Livingstone's partnership.
Post-Match Reflections: De Kock praised the team's effort and the performance of the bowlers.
Markram highlighted the team's resilience despite not playing a complete game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Daren Sammy National Cricket Stadium in Gros Islet.
The game was a day match, and the pitch conditions were different from night matches.
Others: Live updates and match stats were provided throughout the game.
Social media reactions noted South Africa's emergence as serious contenders.
